Public Note: NOTES: BNA: Song, Flight calls (brief). LNS Note: Unbroken cut with internal recordist announcement gain change (MJA, 25Jan2005). DECIDUOUS TREES IN BOTTOM OF CANYON IN PONDEROSA PINE COUNTRY. A FLOCK OF ABOUT 20 BIRDS IN A SMALL ELM FEEDING ON ELM SEEDS. MALES, FEMALES, AND IMMATURES. A) CALLS OF IMMATURES BEING FED BY FEMALES (NO MALES SEEN FEEDING IMMATURES). A FEW AD  Sex: 20 UNKNOWN; JUVENILE(S); ADULT(S)ULTS MAY HAVE CALLED AT ONE TIME OR ANOTHER. B) CALLS OF FLOCK IN FLIGHT (WE HAD TO CHASE THEM AWAY WITH A HANDFUL OF GRAVEL BUT THIS IS THE SAME FLIGHT CALL GIVEN WHEN NOT DISTURBED).
